notes: Interrupts the user's channeling spells upon cast.
Only refreshes items in the user's inventory and backpack. Items in the stash, in other units' inventories or dropped items are unaffected.
Only refreshes items owned by the user. Allied items in the inventory are not refreshed.
Visually resets the cooldown of Tranquil Boots, but does not skip the broken state.
Does not reset the cooldowns of Refresher Shard, Refresher Orb, and Town Portal Scroll.
abilities.description: Reset the cooldowns on all items (except Refresher Orb).

name: Ex Machina
description: The remains of an ancient universe, preserved within a single sphere.
tips: Ex Machina can be shared with Clockwerk once he has obtained his Aghanim's Scepter for Overclocking since Overclocking doesn't refresh items. It is also best shared on item-reliant heroes such as those who builds Black King Bar.
It is also best shared on item-reliant heroes such as those who builds Black King Bar.
